dmca.title: City Maps Inc. wants copyist off the map (and off the search)
dmca.body:
COMMENTS:
THIS IS THE SECOND FAX CONCERNING THIS COPYRIGHT VIOLATION. PLEASE RESPOND.

1ACCOMMODATIONSOURCE.COM IS STILL VIOLATING OUR COPYRIGHT AND BEING DISPLAYED AT THE TOP OF THE SEARCH PAGE
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=Map+of+manhattan&btnG=Google+Search
(SEE: Image results for map of Manhattan). 
THIS FAX WAS FIRST SENT ON OCT. 31, 2005. AGAIN PLEASE RESPOND.
 
October 31, 2005

Google Inc.
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
[private] Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints


Re: 1ACCOMMODATIONSOURCE.COM Copyright violations


Dear Google,
City Maps Inc. which owns aaccessmaps.com, mapplus.com and aamaps.com, has been in the business of producing maps for use on web sites and other media since 1994. All copies of the maps produced and sold by both City Maps Inc. and aacessmaps.com have carried the copyright symbol and the City Maps Inc. name designating City Maps Inc. proprietary rights to the work. Our Manhattan map has been registered with the United States Copyright Office since 1997.

By using the using the query, map of Manhattan, we believe that 1ACCOMMODATIONSOURCE.COM has violated City Maps Inc.'s copyright by their use of our Manhattan maps on their web site. See: http://www.1accommodationsource.com/1a_nyc_main_map.htm
http://www.1accommodationsource.com/1a_nyc_midtown_theater.htm 
http://www.1accommodationsource.com/1a_nyc_lower.htm
In fact you have placed their site at the top of the search page (Image results for map of Manhattan). Accessmaps which is our website is the third site listed. If you look closely at 1ACCOMMODATIONSOURCE.COM maps you will see our copyright symbol.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

On advice from our attorneys, we ask the following:
1.	That you immediately take action concerning this copyright violation.
2.	That you provide to us a written report that you have done so.
 

We have tried to notify 1ACCOMMODATIONSOURCE.COM but the phone numbers and email address below are not functioning or are disconnected.
1 Accommodations Source
[private]
Newport Beach, CA 92675
US

Domain Name: 1ACCOMMODATIONSOURCE.COM

Administrative Contact:
[private] [private]@HOTMAIL.COM 1 Accommodations Source
[private]
NEWPORT BEACH, CA 92660-2001
US
[private] fax: [private]
Technical Contact:
DomainValet.com	[private]@DOMAINVALET.COM Domainvalet.com
[private]
BELLEVUE, WA 98008-6418
US
[private] fax: [private]

Record expires on 21-Jun-2006. Record created on 21-Jun-2001.
Database last updated on 29-Oct-2005 23:50:50 EDT.

Domain servers in listed order:

NS1.NAMESERVE.NET	64.226.28.41
NS2.NAMESERVE.NET	69.0.145.41

Please call [private] ([private]). We look forward to a response by 5:00 PM on November 7, 2005.

Sincerely,
[private], president

Enclosure
cc: [private], Esq.
